thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 35 of 2268
thread.title: Diana Pym

author: Diana Pym
title: Diana Pym
text:
I have now bought two 25mm venetian blinds from Blinds 2go and am very happy with both. The first was a mint colour for the bathroom and as it was going outside the recess I wasn't worried about the fit. It slotted straight into the fittings of the previous blind and is perfect.
The second was a large blind for a picture window to fit inside the recess. My local handyman measured the opening and has installed it today. I am very impressed with the quality of the blinds and my contact with the firm on both occasions was easy and hassle-free.
I would certainly use them again and recommend them to everyone.
